title: Triangle Angle
text: We solved for the $$x$$ and $$y$$ lengths for the final vector, now we just need to use trigonometry to find the angle with respect to the third qudrant and the $$x$$ axis.

title: Apply Arctan Function
text: As in the last question we've already calculated the $$x$$ component of the vector $$Rx=30cos\left(68\right)-27.5cos\left(66\right)=0.05$$, and $$y$$ component $$Ry=30sin\left(68\right)+27.5sin\left(66\right)=52.9$$. Solve $${tan}^{\left(-1\right)} \frac{52.9}{0.05}$$
